question: Which Union Ministry has launched a nation-wide call centre, which aims at free movement for agricultural commodities?
option4: Union Ministry of Electronics and IT
explanation:
The Union Ministry of Agriculture has recently set up a call- centre for enabling free inter-state movement of agricultural commodities.
Named the ‘All India Agri Transport Call Centre’, it coordinates the movement of perishable goods like vegetables and fruits as well as agricultural inputs like seeds, pesticides and fertilisers from one state to another. If any query in transport is received, the call centre forwards it to officials of state government.
